issue.title: [C++] Fix compiler warnings in release mode
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-505](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-505). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Observed compiler warnings in arrow/ipc that cause build failure with `-Werror`

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-505?focusedCommentId=15833572) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 294
